Pre-Game Insights: Michele Marcolini's primary objective is to lead Malta to their first-ever promotion in the UEFA Nations League
Malta has been drawn against Moldova in League D, considered one of the strongest sides in the group
Moldova enjoyed a solid Euro 2024 qualifying campaign, securing a victory against Poland
Others: MFA president Bjorn Vassallo made it clear that Marcolini's main task was to lead Malta to promotion in the UEFA Nations League
Malta has failed to reach this objective in both previous editions of the UEFA Nations League
Moldova is playing in front of their home fans
Marcolini expects Moldova to be very aggressive and to keep an eye on their experienced players, particularly midfielder Artur Ionita
Malta is without three experienced players due to injury: Steve Borg, Enrico Pepe, and Bjorn Kristensen
Goalkeeper Henry Bonello said that the absence of Steve Borg is a major miss
